message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose an initial price of $15000 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it brings to your company. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe the product is a great fit for my business, but I have to stay within a budget. I'm willing to make a significant investment, but I need to make sure it's a good value for my company. Can you consider my counteroffer?
